element.name: MoveChar
element.short: Fills Dest with Char C and Attribut Attr
element.descr: Moves characters into a buffer for use with a view's WriteBuf or WriteLine. Dest must be a TDrawBuffer (or an equivalent array of Words). The low bytes of the first Count Sw_Words of Dest are set to C, or remain unchanged if Ord(C) is zero. The high bytes of the Words are set to Attr, or remain unchanged if Attr is zero.

element.name: InitVideo
element.descr: Initializes the video manager, Saves the current screen mode in StartupMode, and switches to the mode indicated by ScreenMode.

element.name: DoneVideo
element.descr: Terminates the video manager by restoring the initial screen mode (given by StartupMode), clearing the screen, and restoring the cursor. Called automatically by TApplication.Done.

element.name: DetectVideo
element.descr: Detects the current video mode without initializing or otherwise changing the current screen.

element.name: donekeyboard
element.descr: Restores keyboard to original state. FV's keyboard routines may not be used after a call to this. Read(ln)/write(ln) can be used again.

element.name: initkeyboard
element.descr: Initializes the keyboard. Before it is called read(ln)/write(ln) are functional, after it is called FV's keyboard routines are functional.

element.name: InitSysError
element.descr: Error handling is not yet implemented so this simply sets SysErrActive=True (ie it lies) and exits.
